I saw something disturbing in the Howling Vale. Two creatures of the same species fought each other and the victor ate the flesh of the loser.

This is not normal behavior and may be worth investigating."What could we do?"

Our magic may shed light on this phenomenon. Hunt the {@LinkCreature:21#4#brutal orisks} and collect samples from them.

Bring them back and we'll see if we can find what drove them to such unusual behavior.

I hope this wasn't too taxing. The desert is vast and dangerous.

You have the samples? Let me see them. Stand back, now. This could get a bit messy.

By the gods! The scent in these samples almost overwhelmed me! I must rest for now. Incredible. My nose may never forgive me.
I know the creatures are disgusting and odorous, but without the samples, I can't run tests. It's as simple as that.
